mapper.select: select id, acttype, alertkey, devtype, fixalarmlevel, issuedate, liabilitycity, location, networklevel, operationtype, returnresult, stickevent, suspectfaultreasonclass, suspectfaultreasonsection, tasktitle, tempstr3, tolllevel, worktip, wsid from test.order_info where id = #{id}

select id, acttype, alertkey, devtype, fixalarmlevel, issuedate, liabilitycity, location, networklevel, operationtype, returnresult, stickevent, suspectfaultreasonclass, suspectfaultreasonsection, tasktitle, tempstr3, tolllevel, worktip, wsid from test.order_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into test.order_info(acttype, alertkey, devtype, fixalarmlevel, issuedate, liabilitycity, location, networklevel, operationtype, returnresult, stickevent, suspectfaultreasonclass, suspectfaultreasonsection, tasktitle, tempstr3, tolllevel, worktip, wsid) values (#{acttype}, #{alertkey}, #{devtype}, #{fixalarmlevel}, #{issuedate}, #{liabilitycity}, #{location}, #{networklevel}, #{operationtype}, #{returnresult}, #{stickevent}, #{suspectfaultreasonclass}, #{suspectfaultreasonsection}, #{tasktitle}, #{tempstr3}, #{tolllevel}, #{worktip}, #{wsid})
mapper.update:
update test.order_info
acttype = #{acttype},
alertkey = #{alertkey},
devtype = #{devtype},
fixalarmlevel = #{fixalarmlevel},
issuedate = #{issuedate},
liabilitycity = #{liabilitycity},
location = #{location},
networklevel = #{networklevel},
operationtype = #{operationtype},
returnresult = #{returnresult},
stickevent = #{stickevent},
suspectfaultreasonclass = #{suspectfaultreasonclass},
suspectfaultreasonsection = #{suspectfaultreasonsection},
tasktitle = #{tasktitle},
tempstr3 = #{tempstr3},
tolllevel = #{tolllevel},
worktip = #{worktip},
wsid = #{wsid},
where id = #{id}
